Title: Achievable information rates of square MQAM modulation formats after carrier phase estimation
Abstract: © 2017 OSA.The performance of a pragmatic carrier phase estimation algorithm is evaluated over a range of SNRs. The optimal SNR regions for MQAM are compared to an AWGN channel observing gains of up to 40% in throughput.
